description: Latency Lightning: Forging the Fastest Trading Stack Join us for an exclusive Consensus side event co-hosted by Avelacom, AWS, Copper, Elwood, and Kraken. This intimate gathering focuses on low-latency infrastructure solutions for high-frequency trading (HFT) professionals. Discover how cutting-edge connectivity, custody, portfolio management, and exchange services come together to optimize performance, reduce latency, and enhance security in fast-paced markets. Enjoy short expert talks followed by ample networking time to connect with industry leaders and peers. Date: February 11, 2026 Time: 6:30 PM - 9:30 PM Format: Short speaking sessions networking Target Audience: HFT clients and professionals in trading infrastructure Agenda: 6:30 PM: Check-in opens 7:00 PM - 7:02 PM: Opening Remarks 7:02 PM onwards: Networking Registration Information This event is by invitation only. Limited spots are available to ensure meaningful conversations.
